thread.title: Missing Pennsylvania teen found in Mexico with man

title: Missing Pennsylvania teen found in Mexico with man
text:
Missing Pennsylvania teen found in Mexico with man   00:49 
Authorities say a missing Pennsylvania teenager and a 45-year-old man who signed her out of school have been located in Mexico. The man has been arrested. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Authorities say a missing Pennsylvania teenager and a 45-year-old man who signed her out of school have been located in Mexico. The man has been arrested. Linda So reports.
